content: And then I would also note that, once again, in addition to those items, pressuring EPS this year are the investments that we are making behind the bars, behind our supply chain capabilities, additional investment in digital, yes, thatâs pretty much a $0.09 headwind on the digital ERP side alone this year, plus you have the additional D&A from the Papa Pita acquisition and the ERP Plus program that are pressuring EPS as opposed to EBITDA.
